name: commission
description: The fee that the validator collected from staking delegators

name: lamports
description: The amount of reward SOL, in Lamports

name: post_balance
description: The account balance, in Lamports, after receiving the reward

name: pubkey
description: The public key of the account that received the reward

name: reward_type
description: The type of reward, such as fee, rent, voting, or staking
